briefTitle: Non-interventional Study Evaluating Gynecological Impact of Diagnosis and Treatment of Breast Cancer in Patients Younger
officialTitle: A Non-interventional Study Evaluating the Gynecological Impact of Diagnosis and Treatment of Breast Cancer in Patients Younger Than 40 Years (ARTEMIS)
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Describe the impact of diagnosis and the breast cancer care on fertility in patients younger than 40 years
